Privacy Policy

Here is a general privacy policy without using cookies in English: When using this website, information about you will be collected. Some of this information is personal information you voluntarily provide, such as your name and contact details. This information is collected to provide you with a customized service. Additional information collected is statistical and technical data that does not personally identify you. This includes information such as the pages you visited on the site, how you arrived at the site, your IP address, and more. The information collected will be stored in our database, and used according to this privacy policy or as required by law. We will not share your personal information with any third parties without your consent. We employ up-to-date security and encryption measures to protect the information. However, we cannot guarantee absolute protection against intrusions. For any questions or requests regarding the information collected, please contact us at: akiva1132@gmail.com Changes to this policy will be published on the site.
